room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We went to Breakout Games as a spur of the moment decision and we had a wonderful time. We did the mystery mansion room, and wow! It was fun, exciting, and we worked up until the last minute. Our game master was amazing and helpful when we had questions. This room was by far one of the most involved rooms I have done for an escape room and totally worth the money. If you are debating, do this one! It was so much fun and we did this with three people so don't feel like you need a large group to do this!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We did this for Father’s Day surprise for two dads - mystery mansion - we had all five kids and the moms - 22 seconds remained - I think you could have heard our excitement down the street!!!!!!! So much fun !!!’nn

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: We just left from doing the Mystery Mansion and it was so much fun. Tim was the employee who helped us and he was awesome. Shoutout to you, Tim. I highly recommend this place and can't wait to go back and do more!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: Absolutely loved playing Breakout Mystery Mansion with a group of friends! It was harder than we expected and completely fun! Thanks for being our gamemaster Kalee.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Greenville in Greenville
review: Our group had a great time. Cora was an excellent game master. Mystery mansion was the best one we have done so far. Will certainly do again.
